backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing per-user progress and exposing methods to initialize, update, fetch user progress, and return predefined message lists.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs for the scrapbook single‑page experience.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short descriptions summarizing all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color variables, theming for light/dark modes, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing QueryClient and ThemeProvider, rendering ScrapbookSinglePage and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Confetti.tsx: React component generating falling confetti pieces with configurable intensity.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Component spawning and animating floating heart particles at tap positions.
frontend/src/components/journey/Polaroid: Interactive polaroid card allowing image upload/removal and caption editing.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayer.tsx: Floating music player allowing audio upload, play/pause, mute fade effects, and looping playback.
frontend/src/components/sections/GrandFi: Final reveal section showing a celebratory message, coupon card, and optional password‑gated video.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with a live countdown timer and a hint button that triggers a toast.
frontend/src/components/sections/Journey: Displays alternating paragraphs and PolaroidCard components based on journey config.
frontend/src/components/sections/MusicSe: Simple section prompting users to use the floating music player and showing a themed quote.
frontend/src/components/sections/OurSpot: Shows a decorative map with clickable pins that open popovers describing special locations.
frontend/src/components/sections/TeaseSe: Renders a grid of EnvelopeCard components representing secret messages.
frontend/src/components/surprise/Passwor: Password-protected gate that unlocks child content after validating a secret code.
frontend/src/components/surprise/VideoMe: Panel showing an embedded video or a placeholder message if no video URL is configured.
frontend/src/components/tease/EnvelopeCa: Hover/click‑activated envelope card that reveals a message when opened.
frontend/src/config/scrapbookConfig.ts: Defines the full scrapbook birthday experience configuration including hero text, journey paragraphs, tease messages, map pins, finale content, and a password-protected surprise.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity restoration, and client initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating love-letter data, teasing messages, final messages, and user progress via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers, theme variables, scrapbook textures, and utility styles including light/dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/ScrapbookSinglePage.t: Renders the full scrapbook single-page experience with sections, music, interactions, and footer, using scrapbookConfig.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, extended theme settings, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s mobile‑first scrapbook‑style birthday website vision, required images, and implemented features. Includes architectural notes, a detailed feature list, and configuration for sections like the hero, journey, music, and finale.
